title: I Wish You Would (Taylor's Version)
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:09.41] It's 2 a.m. in your car
[00:13.40] Windows down, you pass my street, the memories start
[00:17.42] You say, "It's in the past", you drive straight ahead
[00:21.59] You're thinkin' that I hate you now
[00:23.76] 'Cause you still don't know what I never said
[00:25.12] I wish you would come back
[00:26.63] Wish I never hung up the phone like I did, I
[00:29.15] Wish you knew that I'd never forget you as long as I live and I
[00:33.60] Wish you were right here, right now, it's all good
[00:36.61] I wish you would
[00:38.94] 
[00:41.64] It's 2 a.m. in my room
[00:45.60] Headlights pass the window pane, I think of you
[00:49.94] We're a crooked love in a straight line down
[00:53.82] Makes you wanna run and hide
[00:55.77] Then it makes you turn right back around
[00:57.71] I wish you would come back
[00:59.53] Wish I never hung up the phone like I did, I
[01:01.82] Wish you knew that I'd never forget you as long as I live and I
[01:06.13] Wish you were right here, right now, it's all good
[01:08.02] I wish you would
[01:10.24] I wish we could go back
[01:11.68] And remember what we were fightin' for and I
[01:14.00] Wish you knew that I miss you too much to be mad anymore and I
[01:18.08] Wish you were right here, right now, it's all good
[01:21.28] I wish you would
[01:22.65] I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I
[01:26.44] I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I
[01:30.19] I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I
[01:34.54] You always knew how to push my buttons (I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I)
[01:39.31] You give me everything and nothin' (I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I)
[01:42.59] This mad, mad love makes you come runnin' (I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I)
[01:46.55] To stand back where you stood (I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I)
[01:49.82] I wish you would, I wish you would (I wish you would, I wish you would)
[01:51.52] I wish you would, I wish you would (I wish you would, I wish you would)
[01:53.64] (I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I)
[01:59.58] 2 a.m., here we are
[02:03.44] See your face, hear my voice in the dark
[02:07.08] We're a crooked love in a straight line down
[02:10.95] Makes you wanna run and hide
[02:12.95] But it made us turn right back around
[02:14.99] I wish you would come back
[02:16.49] Wish I never hung up the phone like I did, I
[02:19.15] Wish you knew that I'd never forget you as long as I live and I
[02:23.15] Wish you were right here, right now, it's all good
[02:26.21] I wish you would
[02:27.53] I wish you would come back
[02:28.97] Wish I never hung up the phone like I did, I
[02:31.15] Wish you knew that I'd never forget you as long as I live and I
[02:35.46] Wish you were right here, right now, it's all good
[02:38.10] I wish you would
[02:39.66] I wish we could go back
[02:41.30] And remember what we were fightin' for and I
[02:43.50] Wish you knew that I miss you too much to be mad anymore and I
[02:47.36] Wish you were right here, right now, it's all good
[02:50.48] I wish you would
[02:52.67] You always knew how to push my buttons (I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I)
[02:55.72] You give me everything and nothin' (I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I)
[02:59.92] This mad, mad love makes you come runnin' (I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I)
[03:04.17] To stand back where you stood (I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I)
[03:06.76] I wish you would, I wish you would (I wish you would, I wish you would)
[03:08.04] I wish you would, I wish you would (I wish you would, I wish you would)
[03:09.76] (I wish you would, I wish you would)
[03:13.01] I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I
[03:16.96] I, I-I-I, I, I, I wish, I wish, I
[03:22.88] I wish you would
